snippet: In a sudden escalation of longstanding tensions this week, each side has bitterly accused the other of violating the de facto border in Kashmir, which both sides claim in its entirety.
abstract: Pakistani Army says Indian troops have killed another Pakistani soldier in latest round of clashes in Kashmir.
lead_paragraph: In a sudden escalation of longstanding tensions this week, each side has bitterly accused the other of violating the de facto border in Kashmir, which both sides claim in its entirety.

headline.main: Pakistan: A New Clash in Kashmir
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: A New Clash in Kashmir
